funggrowth.description: Identifiers represent experimental growth profiles documenting fungal species' ability to utilize specific carbon sources (plant biomass components, polysaccharides, and monosaccharides) in the FUNG-GROWTH database, which provides phenotypic data to support functional genome annotation and comparative analysis of carbohydrate metabolism across fungal species.
funggrowth.name: Fungal Growth Database

publications.title: The FUNG-GROWTH database: linking fungal phenotype to genome
